name: Edge
desc: An enumeration to indicate one edge of a rectangle.

items.name: init?(rawValue: Int8)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: var rawValue: Int8
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: static var allCases: [Edge]
items.desc: A collection of all values of this type.

items.name: typealias AllCases
items.desc: A type that can represent a collection of all values of this type.
